attributes.action: Allow England Our Own English Parliament.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current system is unfair. Why should Scottish MPs be allowed to hold seats in Westminster when they have their own Parliament? Scottish and Welsh MPs shoould be removed from the House of Commons and Westminster made an English Parliament. It is about time England got some fairness.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
